snippet: Despite the poor weather, there is great excitement over at Greenwich Park as Rafalca, the horse partly owned by Mitt Romney's wife, competes in dressage. The rider Jan Ebeling is struggling to steer Rafalca clear of the drizzle.
abstract: Despite the poor weather, there is great excitement over at Greenwich Park as Rafalca, the horse partly owned by Mitt Romney's wife, competes in dressage. The rider Jan Ebeling is struggling to steer Rafalca clear of the drizzle.

byline.original: By JON HUANG and CHRISTOPH NIEMANN

headline.main: Competitive Armchair Olympics: High and Dry
